templatelistener.name: timePickerACP
templatelistener.templatecode:
<script type="text/javascript" src="{@$__wcf->getPath()}js/ultimateContent.js"></script> <script type="text/javascript" src="{@$__wcf->getPath()}js/3rdParty/jquery-ui-timepicker-addon.min.js"></script> <script type="text/javascript" src="{@$__wcf->getPath()}js/jquery-ui.timepicker-addon-i18n.js"></script>
